long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Tubelight extension is an innovative solution to integrate your phone system with Chrome Browser, helping your sales and support teams handle more calls effectively. Users can manage all call-related activities on chrome browser and enrich customer interactions through call notifications, click to dial and call recording integration features.

Key Features:
1) On-screen pop-ups for calls: Instantly see key details about the person on the other end of any incoming or outgoing call. You can also access contextual information about previous interactions with the contact.
2) Click-to-dial: Call your customers and leads directly from your Chrome Browser with a single click.
3) Automatic call logs: All incoming and outgoing calls are logged automatically on Chrome Browser.
4) Call recordings: Access call recordings directly from the Chrome extention. If a call has been recorded, the option to play back the call will appear.
